name: City Growth Association
description:
To be or not to be – Take control of your own Hamlet!

Err… Wrong type of Hamlet…

Build your municipality up from humble beginnings to a bustling metropolis! Balance your citizens’ concerns with the needs of industry and sustaining the environment, all while maintaining relations with foreign powers. Will you choose an educated populace? Maintain diplomatic relations, or take an aggressive approach? Proper farms, or more of a dependence on fast food? The decisions, and the consequences, are yours to make.

Presented in a nostalgically charming retro style, with music by Jack Gaino, City Growth Association is equally playable in small sessions or long term.

City Growth association was initially created during Extra Life 2018, being brought to a full product over the course of a few weeks post. A portion of all proceeds go towards Childs Play.
